attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
why are pensoners who have made provisions by paying into private pensions penalised for making a pensional life easier, by being unable to get beniefits that would help in ekeing out their small pension accruments.
while persons who never helped them selves can claim more beneifits which in most cases is more than those who had fortitude by joining a private scheme

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
